specialRules.hint: This model and all friendly units within 12" get the Regeneration special rule.

specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12" get the Stealth special rule.

specialRules.hint: Once per turn, if within 2" of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.
specialRules.name: Repair
specialRules.label: Repair
specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2" of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12" get the Relentless special rule.

specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12" move +3" on advance and +6" on rush / charge actions.

specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12" move +3" on advance and +6" on rush / charge actions.

spells.name: Warpath
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12" gets Stealth next time it"s shot at.

spells.name: Crackling Bolt
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6" must take a dangerous terrain test.

spells.name: Headbang
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12" gets Rending in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Death Bolt
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Teleport
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately move by up to 6".

spells.name: Psychic Vomit
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 4 automatic hits with AP(2).
